page: EC60042: Rf And Microwave Integrated Circuits

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC31005RF/ Microwave Passive Components: Lumped Elements: Equivalent circuits. RF Integrated Circuits : Lumped element approach. RFIC Simulation tools. Linear amplifier design. Effect of parasitics. Planar Transmission Lines, Designing with Scattering Parameters, transistor amplifiers, oscillators and mixers. Microwave Integrated Circuits and VLSI Interconects. RF and Microwave Passive and Active Labs (VNAs etc.).
page: EC60042: Rf And Microwave Integrated Circuits
